alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:07AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN OZARK...SHANNON...EASTERN DOUGLAS...HOWELL...TEXAS AND OREGON COUNTIES THROUGH 200 AM CST... At 106 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Conway to near Norwood to 16 miles southwest of Willow Springs to near Bakersfield. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... West Plains, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Echo Bluff State Park, Current River State Park, Grand Gulf State Park, Mountain Grove, Licking, Mountain View, Thayer, Willow Springs, Cabool, Houston, Winona, Alton, Birch Tree, Eminence, Pomona, Summersville, Raymondville, and Bakersfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Douglas; Howell; Oregon; Ozark; Shannon; Texas
